data.name: The Great Catflap
data.description:
You are the Executive Assistant to the world's number 1 cat impersonator, known simply as The Great Cat Whisperer.  

The Great Cat Whisperer receives many text messages from strangers and would like a 'cat flap' to filter these messages.

If the message is from a contact, return a summary. For example:

```
catflap('Tabby Cat','Finally caught a mouse. Still got it!') // 'Tabby Cat messaged: Finally caught a mouse. Still got it!'
catflap('Snowball','Meow...') // 'Snowball messaged: Meow...'
```

If the message is not from a saved contact, simply return 'Caught in the catflap!'.

```
catflap(020202,'Hi can I have a cat ringtone personalised for when my cat calls?') // 'Caught in the catflap!'
catflap(8265219,'Hey its me your brother can i borrow some catnip?') // 'Caught in the catflap!'
```

But wait, there is one... mysterious... exception. If the message is from 02011118, then pass it on as 'Secret Cat'. For example:

```
catflap(02011118,'Meyowwwww ;-)') // 'Secret Cat messaged: Meyowwwww ;-)'
```
